name: DragonRuby Touch Playground
description:
A learning playground for building common touch (and mouse) functionality with DragonRuby Game Toolkit, from swipes to dragging to virtual gamepads to multi-touch.

Features a swipe tester, dragging, virtual gamepad, multie-touch, waypoint finding, and scrolling.

Works on mobile web, iOS, and Android. On desktop web, you can just click to simulate touches.

View the source!
